channel.title: PNK:NOVAQ on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sunnova Approved to Seek Creditor Vote on Bankruptcy Payout
item.description: Sunnova Energy International Inc., the rooftop solar firm that filed for bankruptcy in June, won court permission to send its payout plan to creditors for a vote.
